arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Nuhu akasema: Kitu gani cha kunijuvya uchache wa hadhi yao na mali yao? Nikitakacho mimi kwao ni Imani yao bila ya kutafuta kuzijua kazi zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
